chuck.help: send a funny chuck norris fact/joke!

me.help: sends information about the member mentioned (id, etc)

channel.help: sends information about the current channel (id, invite, etc)

stats.help: sends statistics about the server (members, bots, channels, etc)

credits.help: returns the people who helped make jesterbot

servermessages.help: sends the number of messages that have been sent in the server

deletemessages.help: delete all messages from the mentioned user

colorview.help: send a hex color and it will send an image of that color

help.help: sends helps about jesterbot. there are 4 different options, 1) `^help <cog>` sends info about a cog, `^help <command>` sends info about a command, `^help <notacommand>` sends commands related, `^help` sends all the cogs

set_prefix.help: set the prefix of the server

pause.help: pause the current music being played

love.help: enter 2 names and it will say the love percentage

lengthcommand.help: sends the ammount of commands the bot has

gay.help: makes your profile picture have the gay flag

config.help: sends information about all the configchannel commands

welcomechannel.help: sends a welcome message in the current channel to anyone who next joins the server

pickuplinechannel.help: part of `config`, sends pickuplines once an hour in the specified channel

invited.help: returns how many people you've invited to this server

ytcomment.help: sends a picture of a youtube comment with the `comment` you wrote

jokechannel.help: part of `config`, sends a joke once an hour in the specified channel

quotechannel.help: part of `config`, sends a quote once an hour in the specified channel

factchannel.help: part of `config`, sends a fact once an hour in the specified channel

remove_welcome.help: part of `config`, removes a welcome channel

suggestchannel.help: makes the channel specified a suggestion channel - members can only type ^suggest or their message gets deleted. nice and orderly

animalimage.help: sends an image and a fact of the animal specified (`imag`)

delsuggestchannel.help: makes the suggestchannel no longer a suggestchannel

verifychannel.help:
creates a channel/uses an existing channel to make the server be secure by adding the need to say `verify` to access the server...remove with `^removeverify` 
1. if channel is not given, this command will create a role called `⚘ member ⚘` and a role called `⚘ unverified ⚘`
2. it will create a channel called `⚘ verify ⚘`
3. when a new member joins they will only see the channel `⚘ verify ⚘`, and if they write `verify` they can text in and see all other channels

rules.help: sends rules, not for this server specifically but good rules to follow in general

leavechannel.help: sends a goodbye message in the current channel to anyone who next leaves the server

booster.help: sends the perks of boosting servers

fibonacci.help: sends the numbers up to `upto` in the fibonacci sequence

nitro.help: sends the perks of having nitro

timezone.help: sends the time of `origin`, if `origin` is not specified, it will sends all the options for `origin`

ascii.help: sends the ascii numbers for the `text`, if `text` is not specified it sends the ascii table

echo.help: sends an embed message of what you send (run it, i cant explain it well)

resume.help: corresponds with pause, it resumes the song being played

rand.help: sends a random number between `num1` and `num2`

threshold.help: makes your profile pic dark and weird

hornypass.help: sends an image of a pass with your profile on it - saying 'licence to be horny'

stop.help: stops all the music being currently played

permreactmute.help: mutes the member from adding reactions, corresponds with `unreactmute`

loop.help: loops the current song being played

permmute.help: mutes the member from typing in chat, corresponds with `unmute`

unreactmute.help: unreactmutes the member from typing in chat, corresponds with `permreactmute`

nowplaying.help: sends the song that is currently playing

unmute.help: unmutes the member from typing in chat, corresponds with `permmute`

skip.help: skips the current song being played

mute.help: mutes the `member` for the given `time`. format time like `1s`, `1m`, `1h`, etc

volume.help: change the volume of the current song being played

reactmute.help: reactmutes the `member` for the given `time`. format time like `1s`, `1m`, `1h`, etc

score.help: sends how many times the bot has been ran

remove.help: removes a song from the current queue

give_roles.help: gives `role` to everyone in the server

dice.help: roles a dice (`num`) is your prediction of what the dice role will be

showroles.help: sends all the roles and their positions in the server

rps.help: play rock paper scissors against the bot `roll` must be rock, paper or scissors

rpsfail.help: play rock paper scissors against the bot - with a twist

showrolepermid.help: shows the perm of the role via id

wasted.help: makes your profile picture say wasted

pickup_line.help: sends a random pickupline, some are explicit

smack.help: smacks `user` with a funny slap gif (random)

delete.help: deletes a channel, if no channel is specified it deletes the current channel

balance.help: part of `economy`, balance sends your current money

gamble.help: gamble a certain amount of money! there is a higher chance of losing the money you gamble, but there is a bigger win reward

position.help: sends the roles and their positions of member

version.help: sends the version of the bot, and more info about the bot

ping.help: sends the ping of the bot

editaim.help: see what the `user`'s last edited message was

update.help: sends the updates about the bot

editsnipe.help: sees what message was most recently edited, `ammount` is how many messages back to search (1 is most recent)

snipe.help: sees what message was most recently deleted, ammount is how many messages back to search (1 is most recent)

prefix.help: The bot has 2 methods of prefix; One is for you personally, and you set this with `^prefix {whatever you want you prefixes to be, you can have more than one - you split them with spaces inbetween}`. The other method is `^server_prefix {whatever you want the server prefix to be - can only be one. Note: this requires Administator`. If you change your prefix personally, it will be for every server regardless of whatever that server's prefix is. `prefix` is your personal prefix that will never change unless you change it, whereas `server_prefix` varies from server to server. Default prefixes are `.` and `^`.

aim.help: sees what message was most recently deleted by `user`

color.help: change the color of the embeds, must be in hex format (0x) at the start. type `.color` to see a website

mindchange.help: sends an image of a person holding a sign saying *change my mind* and your `text`

selfscore.help: says how many times you've ran the bot

topcommands.help: returns the top commands that have been used

topmembers.help: returns the top membersthat have used the bot

guessinggame.help: play a guessinggame against the bot, pick random numbers between 1-100 and it will say higher/lower

move_to.help: move the member to the specified `channel`

shop.help: purchase an item from the shop, leave `purchase` empty to see all purchasable items

role.help: part of `economy` and `shop`, you can purchase a custom role

gun.help: part of `economy` and `shop`, you can purchase a gun to rob people

bag.help: part of `economy` and `shop`, you can purchase a bag to rob people - but you steal less than you would steal with a gun

corona.help: part of `economy` and `shop`, you can purchase corona - meaning that whoever you inflict your covid on cant work for 3 hours

box.help: part of `economy` and `shop`, you can purchase a box - if you unlock it there can be a really good prize

quote1.help: sends a random quote (different source than `quote`)

viewfeedback.help: view the feedback everyones sent! `distance` is how far away from the most recent feedback submission

redit.help: view a random reddit post, `redt` is the subredit

configlevels.help: add a levels system, `rankup` is how many messages until the next level

unlock.help: part of economy, unlock an item that you purchased from `shop`. leave `what` blank to see the options, and type `^inv` to see what items you have and your balance

lyrics.help: send the lyrics of a song (not always the most precise)

join.help: jesterbot will join the current channel that you are in

leave.help: jesterbot will leave the current channel that you are in

minecraft.help: search a minecraft user by their `username` - this sends all their past usernames and dates of change

play.help: play a song into a voice channel (you must be connected)

pp.help: sends your pp size, corresponds with `newpp` to get a new size

pickemoji.help: pick emojis from a list of 709 emojis. press the green tick to automatically add the emoji to your server

newpp.help: get a new pp size - corresponds with `pp`

versions.help: sends the version of the bot, and more info about the bot

leaderboard.help: sends the levels leaderboard for your server

server_prefix.help: The bot has 2 methods of prefix; One is for you personally, and you set this with `^prefix {whatever you want you prefixes to be, you can have more than one - you split them with spaces inbetween}`. The other method is `^server_prefix {whatever you want the server prefix to be - can only be one. Note: this requires Administator`. If you change your prefix personally, it will be for every server regardless of whatever that server's prefix is. `prefix` is your personal prefix that will never change unless you change it, whereas `server_prefix` varies from server to server. Default prefixes are `.` and `^`.

asciiart.help: create beautiful art with emojis and ascii characters

uptime.help: sends how long the bot has been running for

links.help: sends the links of the JesterBot

support.help: start up a help support line with the bot

minecraftstats.help: send statistics about a minecraft server (auto updates), use ip adress

charinfo.help: sends the ascii letters of the specified characters
